title: Dear You - Part 6
detail_text: <:th_ch0002/>I’ve set up the camera<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Okay, okay! Can Kasumin go first!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, sure<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Senpai~♪ Thank you for always calling me cute! When you say that Kasumin is cute, my cuteness goes up by 1000%! From now on, always always look at Kasumin, okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hehe~, Kasumin is satisfied. Then, go ahead, Eli-senpai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thank you for always supporting us. Just a few passing words from you can become such an inspiration to us, so I want to continue to listen to more and more of your opinions. We’ve also been reliant on you for live preparations…. So please keep supporting us, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>We’ll do our best to bring a smile to you and everyone else that supports us! Once again, thank you for everything, and we’ll be in your care going forwards<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Umm, I would like to start by thanking you. Thank you very much for everything. Because I have your support, I can sing with ease. To have you right next to me, cheering me on is something amazing. I’m glad I met you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Me, Aqours, μ’s, Nijigaku, and all other school idols…. You’ve been loving and helping us all. I really admire you for that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Phew, I was so nervous….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, that was a really beautiful message<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eli-senpai! How about Kasumin? Was Kasumin cute?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Of course, Kasumi. You were staring at the mirror for 30 minutes before the shoot, after all. It’s perfect<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>You even made sure your hairpin wasn’t crooked right before the shoot<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eli-senpai, Riko-senpai! You don’t have to say that part~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
